predictions.article: Tariffs threaten Indigenous farmers, economic sovereignty says National Circle for Indigenous Agriculture and Food
predictions.prediction: The imposition of U.S. tariffs on Canadian goods will lead to a 10% decrease in the export volume of Canadian agricultural products to the U.S. within the next month.
